item.description:
Hola,

Join us for a Fiesta en la Playa at the Battistoni Beach at the lake near Karen and Paul's home. Come at 2 p.m. to swim, kayak, canoe, chat, rest, relax, and chat some more. For directions, go to www.googlemaps.com and enter 2 Colony Road, Unionville, CT. At the end of Colony Road is a white, sandy beach with tall pine trees and picnic tables. There is parking along the street and by the beach. Bring swim suits and towel, your canoe or kayak (we have a few to share) and food or beverages to share. Don't forget the beach toys!!Questions? Call me at 860-922-7997 (cell) or 860-673-9678 (home). It is canceled if it is raining. !Hasta luego!

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Fiesta en la Playa
